content: a b o u t d e s i g n feminine and romantic accessory to wear on top of your favourite tshirts or sweaters the collar is worked flat increases are worked to shape the collar the border is worked in a beautiful picot bind off an i-cord is used to lace the collar y a r n knitting for olive one strand of merino held with one strand of soft silk mohair soft rose col 1 ball of each for 1 collar 18g merino - 15g soft silk mohair n o t i o n s 2 stitch markers 1 tapestry needle n e e d l e s 4mm circular needles > 60cm and 4mm dpn to knit i-cord g a u g e 24 sts x 28 row in pattern ---- free patterns are for personal use only no help will be provide thank you for your understanding les patrons gratuits sont à usage personnel uniquement aucune aide ne sera apportée à leurs réalisations merci de votre compréhension
